Class Building

java.lang.Object
  Building

public class Building
extends java.lang.Object

Building class draws a building with a constant number of windows, but other aesthetics can be altered

Version:
8 October 2014
Author:
bnmathews

Constructor Summary
Building(int x, int y, int width, int length, java.awt.Color color, java.awt.Color wcol, java.awt.Color scol, java.lang.String door, java.lang.String acc)
          Constructor for Building that specifies: the x position, the y position, the width and length, the building's color, the window's color, the windowsill's color, the type of door the building uses, and the type of accessory the building displays
